articles.title: Credentials of Nepalese Ambassador to DPRK Accepted
articles.content:
Credentials of Nepalese Ambassador to DPRK Accepted
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Nepalese Ambassador to the DPRK Leela Mani Paudyal at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.
					 He had a talk with the ambassador.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets New Nepali Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets New Nepali Ambassador
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Ho, minister of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, met Leela Mani Paudyal, new Nepali ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him Thursday.
					 Ri Yong Ho referred to the justice and vitality of the line of simultaneously building up the economy and defence of the Workers' Party of Korea and expressed expectation that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Nepal would develop on good terms in the interests of the governments and peoples of the two countries in the future, too.
					
					 The Nepali ambassador said the situation of the Korean peninsula should be peacefully settled, expressing the will to make positive efforts to boost the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long history and tradition in different fields.

articles.title: Military Pressure Will Only Precipitate Destruction of U.S.: Spokesman for No-Nuclear War Committee
articles.content:
Military Pressure Will Only Precipitate Destruction of U.S.: Spokesman for No-Nuclear War Committee
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman of the Pan-Korean Emergency Measure Committee for Opposing Nuclear War Drills against the DPRK released a statement Thursday to condemn the U.S. for recently enhancing military threat and blackmail against the DPRK while imposing the toughest sanctions on it.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. has deployed USS Nimitz strike group in the western Pacific, the operational theater of its 7th Fleet. The nuclear carrier strike group is going to kick off a naval operation for tackling the contingency on the Korean peninsula together with the already deployed Ronald Reagan nuclear carrier strike group.
					
					 Against this backdrop, the U.S. brought its B-1B formation stationed on Guam to the sky above south Korea on June 20 to stage a mock nuclear bomb dropping drill. It is blustering that it will let its strategic bombers make sorties toward the sky above the peninsula more than once a month routinely.
					
					 It also brought long-range air-to-surface missiles to its airbase in Kunsan, North Jolla Province of south Korea in a bid to strike Pyongyang, the capital city of the DPRK, and other major strategic objects. And it let the commander of the Second Division of its army present in south Korea call for "scaling up south Korea-U.S. joint drills" in a public appearance.
					
					 This is just a risky and reckless military move driving the already acute situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war and a blatant challenge to all Koreans and other peace-loving peoples in the world aspiring after peace and security on the peninsula.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is the fact that the U.S. is hyping its outrageous military pressure on the DPRK through media, continuously bringing its lethal hardware for a nuclear war to the peninsula.
					
					 This shows that the U.S. military scenario to ignite a nuclear war on the peninsula at any cost has gone beyond the red line and the Trump administration's advertisement for the exclusion of military option from the "maximum pressure and engagement" policy is no more than a sly trick to cover up their scenario for a war against the DPRK including a preemptive nuclear strike.
					
					 The Trump administration should not run riot, thinking twice about the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its foolhardy military moves. It should properly understand the spirit and will of the Korean army and people to annihilate the enemy and finally conclude the standoff with the U.S.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Hit for Inciting Military Confrontation with DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Hit for Inciting Military Confrontation with DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Peace Committee of Korea gave an answer to question raised by KCNA on Thursday as regards the fact that the south Korean authorities are inciting military confrontation with the DPRK, clamoring about "threat of the north's provocation".
					 He said:
					
					 Recently the south Korean puppet military warmongers staged joint drills of bombing the nuclear facilities of the DPRK in south Korea and the U.S. mainland, together with the U.S. imperialist aggression forces.
					
					 Then they are running amuck in provocative anti-DPRK war drills such as "unification drill in 2017" with June 25 as a momentum.
					
					 Meanwhile, high-ranking authorities including the "prime minister" cried out for the "counter-actions to the north's practical threat", visiting the military units in frontline area and "south Korea-U.S. joint division". The designated defence minister unhesitatingly made reckless remarks that "he would make the battle front proceed northward so that the units can fight in north area".
					
					 In particular, the south Korean chief executive talked about "high-pitched growth of the north's missile provocation" and said that "it is possible to have dialogue in case they have strong military capability" while personally inspecting the test-fire of ballistic missile aimed at the DPRK on June 23. The south Korean puppet authorities and conservative media are expressing this as a "warning message to the north".
					
					 This is a blatant challenge to the DPRK's sincere call for defusing the military tension between the north and the south and a traitorous criminal act of joining in the U.S. war moves against the DPRK.
					
					 Moreover,  the south Korean regime which was deprived of its military sovereignty by the U.S. is working hard to fight against the DPRK, repeating the word "independent national defense", unaware of where it stands. It is utterly ridiculous.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities sincerely wish for the north-south dialogue and peace, they should respond to the DPRK's patriotic appeal to defuse the military tension between the north and the south with the spirit of "By Our Nation Itself", not resorting to the military confrontation yielding to the U.S., the principal enemy, and pleasing the conservative forces.
					
					 They had better listen to the DPRK's warning and advice carefully and make a proper choice.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Refusing to Repatriate DPRK Citizens
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Refusing to Repatriate DPRK Citizens
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Emergency Measure Committee for Rescuing Abducted Persons released a statement Thursday as regards the fact that the south Korean regime has refused to repatriate the DPRK citizens, justifying their detention.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are refusing to repatriate the abducted DPRK citizens and justifying their detention, asserting that Kim Ryon Hui and 12 women citizens of the DPRK who were abducted in group "defected from the north and settled in south Korea according to their free will" and that there is no reason to "repatriate them, according to a law in force."
					
					 This is just another politically-motivated provocation denying the social system of the DPRK.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly "respect personal intention" of the DPRK citizens, they should send them back to the DPRK without delay as wanted by them.
					
					 The unreasonable detention of the DPRK citizens is just an inhuman act of following in the footsteps of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors which had been hell-bent on hideous acts against the nation and humanity, and a human rights abuse going against the principle of the international human rights standard.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are talking about "reunion of separated families" from the north and the south while patronizing the unethical crimes of the former conservative regime which separated the children from their parents and families in broad daylight.
					
					 They should stop this impudent act but unconditionally repatriate the citizens.

articles.title: Anti-U.S Mass Rallies in Cities and Counties of DPRK
articles.content:
Anti-U.S Mass Rallies in Cities and Counties of DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- More mass rallies took place in cities and counties of the DPRK to mark the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism.
					 Present there were officials of party, power and economic organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms and universities and working citizens and youth and students in the local areas. 
					
					 At the rallies speakers disclosed that after igniting a war in Korea, the U.S. imperialists brutally massacred guiltless people, indiscriminately destroyed streets and villages and ran amuck to exterminate the Korean nation by using even internationally banned germ and chemical weapons.
					
					 They expressed the will to mercilessly wipe out the U.S. imperialist ogres and class enemies who cruelly killed many civilians in the war.
					
					 They also evinced their resolve to conclude the standoff with the U.S. victoriously and glorify heroic Korea's history and tradition of victory, true to the Songun revolutionary leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Then followed public processions.

articles.title: SWUK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
SWUK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea (SWUK) led by Chae Chun Hui, vice-chairwoman of its Central Committee, returned home Thursday after attending a meeting of the Secretariat of the Women's International Democratic Federation held in Rome of Italy.

articles.title: Diploma to Kim Jong Un from Nepal
articles.content:
Diploma to Kim Jong Un from Nepal
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a diploma from the Nepal Journalist Association.
					 The diploma says that today the DPRK is further demonstrating its dignity as a nuclear weapons state and rocket power, which the U.S. styling itself as the "only superpower" does not dare to provoke, under the guidance of Kim Jong Un who has made tireless efforts for the building of a socialist power and the country's independent and peaceful reunification and world peace, highly praising him as the greatest hero in the century.
					
					 We wish respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state and the army, good health and happiness for justice, progress, peace and stability of the world.
					
					 The chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association handed the diploma to the DPRK ambassador to Nepal on June 26.

articles.title: Cooperation and Exchange between KFPD and WFD Intensified
articles.content:
Cooperation and Exchange between KFPD and WFD Intensified
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Cooperation and exchange between the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled (KFPD) and the World Federation of Deaf (WFD) have been intensified after the two federations signed a MOU and adopted a four-year action plan in 2012.
					 Amid evermore intensified activities to train disabled persons for diverse occupations, equipment at the Wood-processing Workshop for Deaf were upgraded and assistance was rendered to the Deaf Association of Korea (DAK) in editing and publishing its sign language book.
					
					 Aid equipment were successfully delivered for the project to build up a Braille information network, centered on the Blind Association of Korea, between three blind schools (Pongchon Blind School in South Hwanghae Province, Hamhung Blind School in South Hamgyong Province and Taedong Blind School in South Phyongan Province) and the Kwangmyong Publishing House.
					
					 And Kaeson Nursery in Moranbong District, Pyongyang was spruced up to run a class for early sign language education and train sign language interpreters on a regular basis.
					
					 The WFD has given a sincere helping hand to the DAK in developing light signal electronic goods for the deaf.
					
					 A DAK delegation visited the WFD general secretariat in 2014 to share experience and a delegation of the WFD visited the DPRK in 2016 to agree on strengthening the mutual cooperation.
					
					 When interviewed by KCNA, Ri Chol, chairman of the Sign Language Interpreters Association of Korea, hoped for more active cooperation and exchange between the World Federation of Deaf and the Deaf Association of Korea, between the World Blind Union and the Blind Association of Korea and between the World Association of Sign Language Interpreters and the Sign Language Interpreters Association of Korea.

articles.title: Big Efforts Paid to Preventing Drought Damage in DPRK
articles.content:
Big Efforts Paid to Preventing Drought Damage in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been paid to preventing drought damage in the co-op farms across the DPRK.
					 Co-op farms in South Phyongan Province make an effective use of underground water.
					
					 The Pobu Co-op Farm in Kaechon City secured water resources by digging nearly 30 wells and is drawing water into croplands. 
					
					 And Unsan County built a reservoir with a capacity of several hundred cubic meters in a day.
					
					 North Phyongan Province repaired thousands of water holes and wells and built hundreds of dammed pools to irrigate a large area of croplands by sprinklers and water pumps.
					
					 Co-op farms in South Hwanghae Province are mobilizing various kinds of rolling stocks and water-supply wagons for watering croplands and those in Kaesong City dug or restored over 500 water holes and at least 700 wells and completed more than 100 dammed pools.

articles.title: New Teaching Aids in Good Use
articles.content:
New Teaching Aids in Good Use
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kindergartens across the DPRK have effective use of many teaching aids to improve children's intellectual power.
					 Among those teaching aids are multi-media "Kkotbongori (flower bud)" and "Sinbigyong (fairyland)" (animal part) which are appreciated by children.
					
					 The program "Kkotbongori" carrying over 16,000 images is helpful to preschool education and edification, while improving children's observational and analytic abilities and judgment and application capabilities.
					
					 The program "Sinbigyong" helps children have a correct understanding of things and phenomena through detailed observation of the appearance, character, cry, mode of existence, etc. of 100 species of animals.

articles.title: Year of Victory and Miracle
articles.content:
Year of Victory and Miracle
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- It has been one year since respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was elected as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK on June 29, Juche 105 (2016).
					 The past one year was a year of great victories and changes brought about in attaining the goal of building a socialist power true to the grandiose blueprint advanced at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					
					 Kim Jong Un put forward the modeling of the whole society on Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the supreme programme of the WPK and opened up a new era to realize the cause of immortalizing the great leaders and carry forward the revolutionary history of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under his guidance, the spirit of Kangwon Province and other fresh spirits representative of the present era were created and the dynamic drive for creating the new Mallima speed, symbolic of the spirit of self-reliance, was launched, which was led to the completion of hospitals, fishing stations, factories and bases for cultural and leisure activities one after another in different parts of the country.
					
					 The flood-hit northern areas of North Hamgyong Province were turned into a socialist fairyland in the era of the WPK and Ryomyong Street took its appearance as an icon of modern street architecture.
					
					 Meanwhile, the DPRK succeeded in a series of test-fires of ultra precision and diversified "Juche rockets" like ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12 and ground-to-ground medium-to-long range strategic ballistic missile Pukguksong-2.
					
					 All these achievements are entirely attributable to the indefatigable efforts and devotion made by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Only victory and miracle are in store for Juche Korea which has demonstrated its might as a political and ideological power based on the single-minded unity, nuclear power of Juche and youth power all over the world under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Should Make Responsible Choice for North-South Relations: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Should Make Responsible Choice for North-South Relations: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in an article that the improvement of the north-south relations is starting-point for peace and reunification and unanimous demand of the entire nation.
					 In order to mend the north-south ties, it is important to stop every mud-slinging that incites mistrust and hostility between fellow countrymen, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want the improved north-south relations, they should make a decision to stop a smear campaign against the fellow countrymen, to begin with.
					
					 It is a factor of checking the improvement of the north-south relations that the south Korean authorities raise the settlement of the "north's nuclear issue" as a precondition of dialogue.
					
					 The nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula has nothing to do with the improvement of the north-south relations as it was spawned due to the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					
					 It is the issue to be settled between the DPRK and the U.S. from A to Z.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are linking the settlement of the nuclear issue to dialogue between the north and the south. This is an unpardonable anti-reunification crime as it is an act of following in the footsteps of the Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye groups of traitors who bedeviled the north-south relations in collusion with outsiders and got hell-bent on moves to stifle the DPRK, crying for the "dismantlement of nuclear weapons in the north".
					
					 They should understand that their talk about "sanctions and pressure accompanied by dialogue" will drive the north-south relations deeper into the mire of mistrust and confrontation.
					
					 If the present south Korean authorities respect the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration and speak for the candlelight demonstrators, they should take positive measures to mend the north-south relations, far from the old conception of confrontation, not reading the faces of the U.S. and conservative group.
					
					 They are well advised to make a choice in a responsible manner, under the crucial situation where a radical turn should be brought in improving the north-south relations and reunifying the country independently under the banner of By the Korean Nation Itself.

articles.title: U.S Is Worst Evil in S. Korean Society: Paper of Koreans in U.S.
articles.content:
U.S Is Worst Evil in S. Korean Society: Paper of Koreans in U.S.
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Minjok Tongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S. on June 26 posted a commentator's article saying that the worst evil in south Korea is none other than the U.S.
					 The article said such word as evils is now spreading as popular song in south Korea, adding that Park Geun Hye was the first to utter this expression.
					
					 The article noted that the conservatives, remnants of Park Geun Hye, and the ruling forces styling themselves as progressive have refused to mention the existence of the U.S., the worst evil in the south Korean society.
					
					 The present regime of south Korea has kept mum about THAAD deployment and joint military drills, seeking to disregard the worst evil, it charged.

articles.title: Probe into Truth behind Ryongsan Disaster Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth behind Ryongsan Disaster Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The committee for proving the truth behind the Ryongsan disaster in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on June 26 to urge probe into the truth behind the killing of evacuees in Ryongsan by the fascist police in 2009 and apology and punishment of those responsible for the case, according to the south Korean internet paper Chamsesang.
					 The organization presented to the police a written opinion demanding that the Ryongsan disaster be registered as a typical case of human rights abuses by the police and reinvestigation into the case be made to punish those responsible for it.

articles.title: S. Korean Supreme Court Blasted for Unjust Decision
articles.content:
S. Korean Supreme Court Blasted for Unjust Decision
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet supreme court gave members of the Unified Progressive Party the verdict of guilty on June 23, according to Yonhap News.
					 They were prosecuted on the suspicion of preventing the Intelligence Service's search and arrest of Ri Ki Sok, a lawmaker from the party.
					
					 In August and September 2013, IS agents searched Ri's office and arrested him, charging him with a rebellion plot and the violation of the "Security Law". Those angry members of the party protested against the fascist security authorities' unwarranted suppression.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Patronizing GIs' Environmental Pollution
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Patronizing GIs' Environmental Pollution
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities are openly patronizing the GIs' environmental pollution.
					 According to Segye Ilbo of south Korea on June 26, the present regime on June 23 made a "decision not to open to public the results" of the second and third investigations into the polluted underground water at Ryongsan U.S. military base and its vicinity and lodged an appeal against the court's decision to do so.
					
					 An official of the south Korean Ministry of Environment reportedly said on June 26 that the regime decided not to "open to public" the results of investigation, asserting it is impossible without an agreement with the U.S.
					
					 This is a frontal challenge to the public denouncing GIs for worsening the environmental pollution in south Korea and an act of following in the footsteps of the former conservative regime which kept the humiliating policy of reading the face of its American master.

articles.title: Labor Organizations Stage General Strike in S. Korea
articles.content:
Labor Organizations Stage General Strike in S. Korea
Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Labor movement organizations of south Korea launched a public general strike on Wednesday in demand of the abolition of part-time jobs and hike of minimum salaries, according to KBS.
					The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions declared the start of the general strike at a meet-the press, saying that it would last for two weeks.
					
					The organization stated that a rally for general strike would be held on June 30 with attendance of tens of thousands of people from various strata.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Humiliating Acts toward U.S. Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Humiliating Acts toward U.S. Slammed
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification and other civic and public organizations in south Korea expressed their anger at the authorities' humiliating acts toward the U.S. in an emergency rally in Seoul on June 27.
					 Speakers sniped at the present ruler for his remarks that his visit to the U.S. is "aimed to deepen trust with Trump" and censured Kang Kyong Hwa, new foreign minister, for talking about "alliance between south Korea and the U.S." during his visit to the 2nd Division of the U.S. forces.
					
					 They urged the south Korean "government" to desist from studying the outsiders' face.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a congratulatory letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on Thursday, the first anniversary of his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The letter said that Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the DPRK State Affairs Commission was a historic event as it provided eternal foundation for hastening the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche started in Mt Paektu.
					
					 Thanks to you, the motherland is now demonstrating its dignity as an invincible socialist bulwark where the people always lead a happy life, an unimaginable politico-ideological power based on single-minded unity and a powerful nuclear weapons state and rocket power which no formidable enemy can dare to provoke, it stated, adding:
					
					 The General Association and all Koreans in China will always share mind and keep pace with the general onward movement of the people in the homeland dashing ahead like the wind toward the Conference of Mallima Frontrunners under your Songun revolutionary leadership and thus live up to your trust and expectation growing deeper with loyalty.
					
					 We will further intensify the anti-U.S. and anti-war peace struggle for putting an end to the U.S. imperialists' colonial rule over south Korea and frustrating their ever-more undisguised nuclear war moves against the DPRK and conduct a vigorous mass movement for peace on the Korean peninsula, holding high the banner of national independence and great national unity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- The Russian newspaper Komsomolskaya Pravda on June 21 carried the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" on the occasion of the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 1st anniversary of Kim Jong Un's election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 The work, published on Oct. 4, Juche 104 (2015), says that 70-year history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a history of victory which displayed the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and that the cause of the Party is invincible.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Guinea
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Guinea
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Conakry, Guinea on June 15.
					 Riyad Chaloub, chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold events to widely introduce the noble career and greatness of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A DR Congo committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Kinshasa on June 16.
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the DR Congo National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize a remembrance meeting, a seminar, a photo exhibition, a film show and other political and cultural events to praise the exploits of Kim Il Sung on the anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Britain
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Britain
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in London on June 17.
					 Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, was elected chairman of the above-said committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold a remembrance meeting, a photo exhibition and other political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of the President on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Works of Great Men of Mt Paektu Studied Abroad
articles.content:
Works of Great Men of Mt Paektu Studied Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Seminars on works of the great men of Mt Paektu were held in Iceland, Nigeria and Germany between June 13 and 18 to mark the 53rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society praised Kim Jong Il as the greatest man who devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness at the seminar on his work "Let Us Reunify the Country Independently and Peacefully through the Great Unity of the Entire Nation".
					
					 Explaining the gist of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution", the chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il strengthened the Party, the general staff of the revolution, and rallied the entire army and all the people as one around it. And he built up the People's Army into the army of the leader intensely loyal to the Party's cause and an invincible revolutionary army.
					
					 The chief of the German Group for the Study of Korean Culture said at a seminar on Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious":
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il declared it as the supreme programme of the WPK to model the whole society on Kimilsungism and strengthened it into a genuine party for the people.
					
					 Today, the WPK with respected Supreme Leader Comrade Kim Jong Un as its chairman is wisely leading the Korean people's struggle to implement the behests of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under his guidance, Korea will emerge a reunified and prosperous socialist power before long.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador de Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam recibe cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador de Nepal
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, recibio hoy en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae las cartas credenciales del nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Democratica Federal de Nepal en la RPDC, Leela Mani Paudyal.
					Tras recibirlas, Kim departio con el diplomatico.

articles.title: RPDC condena el Organo Internacional de Supervision Financiera
articles.content:
RPDC condena el Organo Internacional de Supervision Financiera
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada con respecto a que un organo internacional de supervision financiera cuestiono a la RPDC, el vocero del Comite Nacional de Coordinacion de la RPDC sobre el Anti-lavado de Dinero y Anti-Financiacion del Terrorismo dio ayer la siguiente respuesta: 
					En la reunion plenaria efectuada del 21 al 23 en Valencia de Espana la Fuerza Atareada de Accion Financiera contra el Lavado de Dinero volvio a publicar la llamada "declaracion publica" cuestionando a la RPDC. 
					
					Rechazamos fuertemente ese "documento" calificandolo como una parte de la brutal campana anti-RPDC que lanzan EE.UU. y sus satelites abusando del aparato internacional de supervision financiera.
					
					En el "documento" esta ocultado el astuto intento del pais americano de arrebatar las armas nucleares de la RPDC acusandola del "pais lavador de dinero" y racionalizando las ilegitimas sanciones financieras anti-RPDC.
					
					Lo evidencia bien el hecho de que bajo la instigacion de EE.UU., ese organismo volvio a aprobar la "declaracion publica" que repite invariablemente las insistencias de EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles dando vista gorda a las realidades de la RPDC donde se instituyo la ley contra el lavado de dinero y financiacion del terrorismo que conviene a las normas internacionales y funciona normalmente el sistema de supervision e informatizacion financieras de acuerdo con ella.
					
					Las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU son productos de los actos criminales antieticos y anti-derechos humanos de EE.UU. y las fuerzas seguidoras que desprecian la Carta de la ONU y las leyes internacionales y violan la soberania y el derecho a existencia del Estado soberano.
					
					Si la parte de ese organo esta interesada de veras en el asunto de prevencion de lavado de dinero y financiacion del terrorismo de nuestro pais, debe prestar la merecida atencion a cuestionar el complot terrorista estatal de categoria especial cometido por los organos de inteligencia de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea, lo que fue presentado anteriormente por nuestra parte.
					
					Si el organismo internacional de supervision financiera sigue entregandose a dar presion a la RPDC bailando al son que le toca el pais americano, nos vemos obligados a pensar seriamente el mantenimiento de las relaciones de cooperacion con ese organo.

articles.title: Portavoz de CPME advierte a las imprudencias militares de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Portavoz de CPME advierte a las imprudencias militares de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias, Estados Unidos agranda mas la amenaza y chantaje militares a paralelo de la sancion sobredura anti-RPDC, el portavoz del Comite Pannacional de Medidas Emergentes (CPME) contra los Ejercicios de Guerra Nuclear anti-Norte hizo publica el dia 29 una declaracion.
					EE.UU. intenta enviar la flotilla de portaaviones Nimitz al Pacifico Oeste, agua de operacion de la septima flota norteamericana, para realizar la operacion maritima para el tiempo de emergencia de la Peninsula Coreana junto con la ya desplegada flotilla de portaaviones nucleares Ronald Reagan, revela el vocero y continua:
					
					Mientras tanto, el dia 20 el pais norteamericano envio la escuadrilla de bombardero estrategico nuclear B-1B, estacionada en la Isla Guam, al cielo surcoreano donde adiestro el entrenamiento de bombardeo virtual, y dice que en el futuro despachara regularmente mas de una vez al mes las aeronaves de igual tipo a la region de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Sobre todo, EE.UU. emplazo en la base aerea norteamericana situada en Kunsan de la provincia de Jolla del Norte del Sur de Corea el misil aire-tierra de largo alcance, con la mision de atacar a Pyongyang y otros blancos estrategicos importantes de la RPDC. Y presento en un lugar oficial al jefe de la segunda division del ejercito norteamericano ocupante del Sur de Corea, quien habla ruidosamente de la "ampliacion de los ejercicios conjuntos Sur de Corea-EE.UU."
					
					Estas locuras militares llevan la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana tan aguda al borde de la guerra nuclear y desafian a todos los coreanos que desean la paz y la seguridad de la Procurrente Coreana y los pueblos amantes de la paz del mundo.
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que EE.UU. sigue ubicando los armamentos mortiferos de guerra nuclear, publicando abiertamente en la prensa la brutal ofensiva militar anti-RPDC.
					
					Esto insinua que el intento militar de EE.UU. de desatar sin falta la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana ya entro en la imprudente fase de ejecucion y demuestra que la insistencia de la administracion Trump en la exclusion de la opcion militar en la "politica de maxima presion y compromiso", no pasa de ser una artimana para encubrir sus intenciones astutas de provocar una guerra contra la RPDC incluso el ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					La administracion Trump debe actuar con prudencia viendo correctamente la voluntad del ejercito y pueblo coreanos de poner fin a la confrontacion con EE.UU. y pensando en serio en las consecuencias tragicas que causaran sus imprudencias militares.

articles.title: Portavoz del CNCDP condena disparates que buscan enfrentamiento militar Norte-Sur
articles.content:
Portavoz del CNCDP condena disparates que buscan enfrentamiento militar Norte-Sur
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que las autoridades surcoreanas inculcan la confrontacion militar con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hablando tanto de la supuesta "amenaza de provocacion del Norte", el portavoz del Comite Nacional Coreano por la Defensa de la Paz (CNCDP) se entrevisto el dia 29 con la ACNC y dio la siguiente respuesta:
					  Recientemente, los belicistas del ejercito titere surcoreano realizaron junto con las tropas norteamericanas en el Sur de Corea y el territorio de EE.UU. el entrenamiento conjunto de bombardeo a nuestras instalaciones nucleares.
					
					Seguidamente, libraron con motivo del 25 de junio (dia de inicio de la pasada guerra coreana), el "ejercicio por la unificacion de 2017", entre otros adiestramientos provocativos para la agresion a la RPDC.
					
					  Por otra parte, el "primer ministro" y otras autoridades de alto rango abogan por la "reaccion a la amenaza sustancial del Norte" en sus giras por las unidades militares en las zonas del frente, la "division combinada Sur de Corea-EE.UU.", etc. 
					
					Para colmo, el candidato a ministro de Defensa Nacional chismeo sin escrupulos que "en el tiempo de emergencia, trasladara al norte la linea del frente para que las batallas se entablen en el territorio norcoreano".
					
					  Presenciando el dia 23 el lanzamiento de ensayo de misil balistico contra la RPDC, el mandatario surcoreano dijo que "llega al alto nivel la provocacion de misiles del Norte" y "es posible el dialogo cuando sea fuerte la capacidad de defensa nacional".
					
					  Estas palabras son descritas por las autoridades surcoreanas y los medios de prensa conservadores como "mensaje de advertencia al Norte".
					
					  Este hecho deviene el desafio frontal a nuestro llamamiento sincero a eliminar la tension militar entre el Norte y el Sur y el crimen antinacional de incorporarse a las maniobras de guerra anti-RPDC de EE.UU.
					
					  Resulta muy ridiculo el mismo hecho de que los titeres surcoreanos, que entregaron su soberania militar a EE.UU., trataran de enfrentarse con la RPDC hablando de la supuesta "defensa nacional independiente".
					
					  Si las autoridades surcoreanas desean de veras el dialogo con la RPDC y la paz, no deben recurrir al acto suicida de confrontacion militar obedeciendo a EE.UU., enemigo principal de la nacion, y lisonjeando a las fuerzas conservadoras sino aceptar nuestro llamamiento patriotico de eliminar primero la tension militar entre el Norte y el Sur con el espiritu "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					  Ellas tienen que tomar la opcion correcta escuchando con seriedad nuestra advertencia y consejo.

articles.title: Vocero de entidad nortena urge devolucion de ciudadanas detenidas en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Vocero de entidad nortena urge devolucion de ciudadanas detenidas en Sur de Corea 
Pyongyang, 29 de junio (ACNC) -- En relacion con que las autoridades surcoreanas niegan la devolucion de las ciudadanas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y justifican su retencion forzosa, el vocero de la Comision de Medidas Emergentes por la Salvacion de las Victimas del Secuestro Forzoso de la RPDC hizo publica hoy una declaracion.
					Las autoridades surcoreanas niegan la devolucion y justifican su retencion forzosa chismeando que Kim Ryon Hui y las otras 12 ciudadanas secuestradas, que demandan su repatriacion, "se escaparon del Norte y se quedaron segun sus voluntades libres" y que "no hay ningun fundamento de la ley vigente para devolverlas a la parte Norte".
					
					Estas sofisterias descaradas son para frenar la lucha de diversos estratos surcoreanos que exigen fuertemente la devolucion pronta de las norcoreanas, enganar a las opiniones publicas y encubrir cueste lo que cueste el verdadero aspecto de los crimenes antieticos cometidos por la banda traidora conservadora.
					
					Asi denuncia el vocero en su declaracion y continua:
					
					Ademas, devienen una intolerable provocacion politica que no reconoce el regimen de la RPDC.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas respetan de veras "las voluntades de ellas", deben devolver sin demora a las ciudadanas de la RPDC inclusive Kim y otras 12 mujeres, aceptando sus exigencias.
					
					La injusta retencion forzosa de las ciudadanas de la RPDC constituye un crimen antihumanitario que repite los delincuentes antinacionales y antieticos de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye, y una violacion de los derechos humanos que contraviene a las normas y principios internacionales sobre asuntos de DDHH.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no deben hablar mas cerca del "encuentro de familiares separados" amparando los crimenes antieticos de la banda conservadora que dividio a plena luz del dia los padres e hijas, y devolverlas incondicionalmente.
